changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: modify template album content column type
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `vika_template_album` MODIFY COLUMN `content` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'Template Album Content' AFTER `description`;

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: add template mark column in space asset
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `vika_space_asset` ADD COLUMN `is_template` tinyint UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '[Redundant] Whether it is a template attachment (0: No, 1: Yes)' AFTER `file_size`;
